data.headline: Junior Product Manager
data.summary: Motivated and detail-oriented junior product manager with a strong background in enterprise software development. Skilled in agile methodologies, user research, and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about delivering innovative solutions that meet customer needs.

experience.title: Junior Product Manager
bullets: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define product requirements and roadmaps for enterprise software solutions.
Conducted user research and market analysis to identify customer pain points and opportunities for product improvements.
Worked closely with the engineering team to ensure timely delivery of new features and bug fixes.
Developed and maintained product documentation, including user guides and release notes.
Participated in agile ceremonies and contributed to the continuous improvement of the product development process.

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
bullets: Gathered and analyzed business requirements for a large-scale enterprise resource planning (ERP) system implementation.
Documented and communicated process flows, data models, and user stories to the development team.
Participated in user acceptance testing and provided feedback to improve the system's usability.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. The candidate is a young, Caucasian man with short brown hair and a friendly, confident expression.
